title: Hidden Love
overview: Li Chuchu, a young woman from a noble family who has been oppressed for years, discovers that her motherâ€™s death was not accidental. Determined to seek justice, she embarks on a mission to uncover the truth. Along the way, she becomes entangled in a complex relationship with her legitimate brother, Li Zhen, as they both wrestle with love, revenge, and their search for justice.
